mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY SUBSTR(SCHEDULE_DATE,1,8) ORDER BY SCHEDULE_DATE)) RN, SCHEDULE_NO, SCHEDULE_ID, SCHEDULE_TITLE, SCHEDULE_CONTENT, SCHEDULE_DATE, SCHEDULE_REGDATE, SCHEDULE_BOARD_NO FROM SCHEDULE WHERE SCHEDULE_ID = #{id} AND SUBSTR(SCHEDULE_DATE,1,6) = #{mdate}) WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 AND 3
SELECT COUNT(SCHEDULE_TITLE) FROM SCHEDULE WHERE SCHEDULE_ID = #{id} AND SUBSTR(SCHEDULE_DATE, 0,8) = #{mdate}
SELECT * FROM SCHEDULE WHERE SCHEDULE_ID = #{id} AND SUBSTR(SCHEDULE_DATE, 0,8) = #{mdate}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE(SCHEDULE_NO, SCHEDULE_ID, SCHEDULE_TITLE, SCHEDULE_CONTENT, SCHEDULE_DATE, SCHEDULE_REGDATE) VALUES(SCHEDULE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{schedule_id}, #{schedule_title}, #{schedule_content}, #{schedule_date}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE SCHEDULE SET SCHEDULE_TITLE = #{schedule_title}, SCHEDULE_CONTENT = #{schedule_content}, SCHEDULE_DATE = #{schedule_date} WHERE SCHEDULE_NO = #{schedule_no}
